940380.name: Ascend
940380.description: Get ready to play the insane Combat RPG game, Ascend! Created by Revamp Games, this is an immersive solo or local co-op game for up to four players! Fight off the Physco-Bots for as long as possible and battle epic bosses! Select from awesome characters such as the magical Phase, the suave TwinBlast, the valiant Kwang, and the majestic Dekker! Fight in a breath-taking environment with highly realistic models and textures. You just haven't seen graphics this good in a Creator's Collection game! Are you ready to Ascend to greatness?
940380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
